resources.string:
Message Before Encryption: %1$s

Encrypting … SUCCESS

...........................

Decrypting … SUCCESS

Message After Decryption: %2$s
This device is not supported by the native Android keystore.
The key store threw an internal error which means that despite all other criteria match you cannot use the key store on this device.
An error has happened when trying to encrypt or decrypt a value.
Blame it all on us! Create an issue on GitHub.
KeyPair does not exist in Keystore
